CustomField.formula: lEFT(( IF (INCLUDES( Competency__c ,"Compute" )," Compute Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"Visualization"), " Visualization Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"Compute DGX"), " Compute DGX Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"DGX"), " DGX Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"Embedded Edge"), " Embedded Edge Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"Virtualization" ), " Virtualization Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null)), LEN( IF (INCLUDES( Competency__c ,"Compute" )," Compute Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"Visualization"), " Visualization Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"Compute DGX"), " Compute DGX Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"DGX"), " DGX Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"Embedded Edge"), " Embedded Edge Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) & IF (INCLUDES(Competency__c ,"Virtualization" ), " Virtualization Competency Exhibit for " & Text(Program_Type__c) & " & ",null) )-2)
CustomField.label: CompetencyExhibitWithAccNameAndCompDate
